titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Iron City Legal Assistance Workers Records, 1976-1993 AIS.1984.18
titlestmt.author: Zachary Brodt

did.unittitle: Iron City Legal Assistance Workers Records

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Iron City Legal Assistance Workers (Pittsburgh, Pa.)

did.abstract: The Iron City Legal Assistance Workers (ICLAW) union was formed in 1981 and represented workers of Neighborhood Legal Services Association, Inc. This collection includes information regarding the formation and activities of ICLAW in western Pennsylvania.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The Iron City Legal Assistance Workers (ICLAW) union was formed in 1981 out of the Legal Staff Services Association. ICLAW was chosen to represent workers of the Neighborhood Legal Services Association, Inc. (NLSA) through a National Labor Relations Board election in 1981 and gained affiliation with the National Organization of Legal Service Workers, District 65, United Auto Workers in 1982. The union promoted the availability of legal services and education to low income residents of Allegheny, Beaver, Butler, and Lawrence Counties in Pennsylvania by negotiating fair working conditions, wages and hours in contracts for its members working in the NLSA.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This collection contains documents regarding the formation of the Iron City Legal Assistance Workers (ICLAW) union, including organizing committee records, draft by-laws, and National Labor Relations Board election information. Also present are files on contact negotiations between ICLAW and Neighborhood Legal Services Association, Inc. (NLSA). Information regarding ICLAW's political action and advocacy initiatives, in addition to research subject files, are also included.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Iron City Legal Assistance Workers Records, 1976-1993, AIS.1984.18, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was processed by Archives Service Center Staff.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The University of Pittsburgh holds the property rights to the material in this collection, but the copyright may still be held by the original creator/author. Researchers are therefore advised to follow the regulations set forth in the U.S. Copyright Code when publishing, quoting, or reproducing material from this collection without the consent of the creator/author or that go beyond what is allowed by fair use.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged into the following series:
Series I. Precursor Organization, Legal Staff Services Association, 1977-1981
Series II. The Organization of the Iron City Legal Assistance Workers, 1980-1983
Series V. National Labor Relations Board, 1982-1992
Series VI. Political Action, Lobbying, Advocacy, 1980-1990
Series VIII. IC Light ICLAW newsletter, 1982-1984
Series IX. Research and Information Files, 1976-1993

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of the Iron City Legal Assistance Workers Executive Board on July 11, 1984.

odd.head: Previous Citation
odd.p: Iron City Legal Assistance Workers Records, 1976-1993, AIS.1984.18, Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh
